description:
As a system administrator
  I want the BNE integration to have robust multi-layer retry mechanisms
  So that temporary failures don't cause message delivery failures

elements.name: PopToken generation succeeds on first attempt

steps.name: the test environment is configured for network mocking
the BNE retry configuration is loaded
I mock the PopToken API to respond successfully on first call
I generate a PopToken for BNE authentication
the PopToken should be generated successfully
no retry attempts should be made
the response time should be under 5 seconds

elements.name: PopToken generation succeeds on second attempt

steps.name: the test environment is configured for network mocking
the BNE retry configuration is loaded
I mock the PopToken API to fail on first call with "PopTokenBuilderException"
I mock the PopToken API to succeed on second call
I generate a PopToken for BNE authentication
the PopToken should be generated successfully
exactly 1 retry attempt should be made
the retry delay should be applied correctly

elements.name: PopToken generation fails after all retries

steps.name: the test environment is configured for network mocking
the BNE retry configuration is loaded
I mock the PopToken API to always fail with "PopTokenBuilderException"
I generate a PopToken for BNE authentication

    at processTimers (node:internal/timers:529:7)

steps.name: the PopToken generation should fail
exactly 3 retry attempts should be made
the final result should be null

elements.name: PopToken retry delay verification

steps.name: the test environment is configured for network mocking
the BNE retry configuration is loaded
I mock the PopToken API to fail on first 2 calls
I mock the PopToken API to succeed on third call
I generate a PopToken for BNE authentication
the PopToken should be generated successfully
the delay between retries should be at least 30000ms

elements.name: BNE API retries on 429 Too Many Requests

I mock the BNE bulk API to fail with status 429 on first call
I mock the BNE bulk API to succeed with status 202 on second call
I send bulk messages to BNE API
the bulk message should be sent successfully
exactly 1 retry attempt should be made
the retry reason should be "Too Many Requests"
